title: Why has the developer of the property located at the intersection of Hwy 50 and 210 in Surf City found it necessary to remove most of the trees on the site?  I remember a lot of large trees on the site.  Does Surf City not have a tree preservation ordinance?  And how is designated as a Tree City USA?  Either way, the loss of the trees is unfortunate.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6661
